thread.section_title: Nkon Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van Nkon | nkon.nl
thread.title: Sigurður Kristinn

author: Sigurður Kristinn
title: Sigurður Kristinn
text: This is in my opinion the best source for batteries in Europe, one of very few places you can get legit Sony vtc5a's! Shipping is excellent, it took only five days from when shipped to arrive at customs in Iceland. Prices are excellent and there are no sales taxes for countries outside of the European union, not every company follow through with that! I definitely recommend Nkon, I would give them an extra star if it were possible.
